price: 69. Kemudian pasti akan Kami tarik dari setiap golongan siapa di antara mereka yang sangat durhaka kepada Tuhan Yang Maha Pengasih.
arabic: ثُمَّ لَنَنزِعَنَّ مِن كُلِّ شِيعَةٍ أَيُّهُمۡ أَشَدُّ عَلَى ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ عِتِيّٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: thumma lananziʿanna min kulli shīʿatin ayyuhum ashaddu ʿalā al-raḥmāni ʿitiyyan
